title: Active Sessions Overview / Aktif Oturumlar Özeti
description: Comprehensive overview of all active database sessions with connection details, wait events, and execution status

queries.sql: SELECT s.SID, s.SERIAL#, s.USERNAME, s.STATUS, s.OSUSER, s.MACHINE, s.PROGRAM, s.LOGON_TIME, w.EVENT, w.WAIT_TIME FROM V$SESSION s LEFT JOIN V$SESSION_WAIT w ON s.SID = w.SID WHERE s.USERNAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY s.LOGON_TIME DESC

doc_hint: Review active sessions by username and status. Identify long-running sessions, waiting events, and potential blocking locks. Flag any sessions in 'INACTIVE' status for extended time.
analysis_prompt: Summarize session distribution by status and program. Identify any sessions with high wait times or unusual events. Recommend action if sessions appear stuck.
